    • Method Detail

      • trades

        public void trades(Trader trader,
          edu.nyu.cims.cims.compfin09.hw2.interfaces.IMessage message)
        Method to trade received order
        Parameters:
        trader - Trader which send this order
        message - Order Message (such as, Market order, Limit order or Cancel/Replace order)

      • inputLimitOrder

        public void inputLimitOrder(Order order,
                   Book book)
        Method to input limit order into Bid book or Ask book
        Parameters:
        order - Limit order to input
        book - Book to save this limit order. That is, the order's symbol book.

      • preChecking

        public boolean preChecking(Order order)
        Method to check if this order is valid or not.
        Parameters:
        order - Order to check (The order can be any type, such as Market, Limit or CxRx)
        Returns:
        Validity of this order. If it is an invalid order, return false. Otherwise, return True.

      • transactShares

        public void transactShares(Order order)
        Method to process Buy/Sell transaction (Processing flow) 1) Get first order of the price 2) Transaction 3) If (first order quantity) > (required quantity), input the remain quantity of the first order into the first order position. 4) If (first order quantity) <= (required quantity), remove first order and get the next order to continue transaction. 5) If there are no any more available quantity for transaction, discard the remain quantity of the order.
        Parameters:
        order - Order to transact (Market order / Limit order)

      • removeCertainOrder

        public void removeCertainOrder(edu.nyu.cims.cims.compfin09.hw2.interfaces.ICxRxMessage cxRxMessage)
        Method to cancel previous order with CxRx Message
        Parameters:
        cxRxMessage - CxRxMessage to Cancel previous order.

      • replaceCertainOrder

        public void replaceCertainOrder(edu.nyu.cims.cims.compfin09.hw2.interfaces.ICxRxMessage cxRxMessage)
        Method to replace previous order with CxRx Message (Processing flow) 1) Search and remove the previous order 2) Input new order into the rear of the order list.
        Parameters:
        cxRxMessage - CxRxMessage to replace previous order.

      • printAllBooks

        public void printAllBooks()
        Method to print current all books information. Print all symbols' books and their Bid / Ask books.

      • addObserver

        public void addObserver(Trader trader)
        Method to add an observer. In here, an observer is a Trader.
        Parameters:
        trader - Trader to observe this simulator or replay saved transactions.

      • deleteObserver

        public void deleteObserver(Trader trader)
        Method to delete an observer.
        Parameters:
        trader - Trader to delete.

      • notifyObservers

        public void notifyObservers()
        Method to notify all observers If this simulator is not visible, observers cannot get any notifications. If this simulator is visible, but the each observer don't want to get the notification, the notification is not sent. If this simulator is visible, and the each observer want to get the notification, send it.
        Overrides:
        notifyObservers in class java.util.Observable

      • notifyObserver

        public void notifyObserver(Trader trader,
                  java.lang.String printStr)
        Method to notify certain observer. This notification is some error message by order of certain observer, such as wrong order.
        Parameters:
        trader - Trader to notify this message
        printStr - Message to send.
